group_1.textCenter: So you want to hear about us here at Puella@Care, for starters?
Well, the long an' short of it is that we're@just Coordinators who make house calls.
Someone phones me up, and depending on what@they've got t' offer, we can be there in a flash.
There's times when we just travel around and set@up shop here an' there for a while, too.
...And of course, there's one other thing!
Teaching girls who can't fight Witches-- much@like yours truly-- how to scrape by!
Take Mitama, for instance. If I hadn't happened@to drop by Kamihama back then...
...I reckon she'd have been off to the big one@in the sky, eh?
'Course, Yozuru and Sudachi from my place are no@different.
If I hadn't taught them the ropes, their lives@would be pretty darn tough right around now.
Oh, and by the way.@Just so y' know about those two...
I don't go dragging 'em all over the place most@of the time.
They've both got school to go to and grades to@keep up, y'know?
'Far as our current outing goes, I just happened@to have 'em tag along by chance.
